summary: Legal professional with a demonstrated history of working in the legal services industry. Skilled in commercial, procurement, privacy and corporate law, as well as English, U.S and European Law. Strong legal professional with a Master of Laws - LL.M. focused in EU and US Antitrust Law & Regulation, exposed to different jurisdictions and legal traditions (common and civil law), each in their natural environment.

'description': "Legal Internship at DanTrade Cycles & Procurement HQ. 

During the internship I engaged in legal work surrounding the operations from a  contractual and regulatory compliance perspective. My work varied from drafting/reviewing/negotiating agreements with suppliers, to designing relevant legal & compliance risk management solutions, communicating updates on new regulatory requirements and providing legal support to all areas under the scope of Cycles & Procurement. Some of these  areas include direct/indirect sourcing, milk cycles, ingredients, packaging and product security. 

A large part of my work involved regulatory compliance of initiatives and operations with all EU regulations. In particular my focus was on sensitive EU Antitrust topics such as cooperation agreements with other market operators, exchange of information, market dominance and vertical relationships with business partners. Furthermore, as part of the regulatory compliance scope, I assisted the team in designing the internal GDPR guidelines and for all relevant stakeholders and organized training sessions focused on infringement prevention and deeper understanding on the matter.

Overall, my role consisted in assisting the lawyers of the General Counsel's team in providing indications of potential risks of violations and determine the most compliant and effective ways of fulfilling operative goals both short and long-term.", 'title': 'Legal & Regulatory Compliance Intern', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 284053, 'name': 'Clyde & Co', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGuc7kO80RGIQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1688381651865?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=yu1oEK7PmT4OEcRy4TUVc41HVZZlWwQW0EfHFoeR1HA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/clydeco/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'London, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Clyde & Co', 'description': 'About the project:

Clyde & Co has launched an innovative Pro Bono clinic via Skype. This is the first clinic to operate using Skype technology.  Student pro-bono advisers and Clyde & Co lawyers are able to advise from their offices, so the whole team is able to participate.  BPP Law students play a key role in this project by facilitating the meetings, sitting with the clients at Brent CAB and by taking notes. Pro-Bono advisers also undertake basic casework such as correspondence letters.', 'title': 'Student Pro Bono Adviser', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 6980, 'name': 'Simmons & Simmons', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHsFNdb0XQqmw/company-logo_400_400/0/1657723729431?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=5IpWRWjeoyqrkyOom8WkZAzae7Ts2fPL2mo5ZiRysK8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/simmons-&-simmons/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'London, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Simmons & Simmons', 'description': "About the project:

The Battersea Legal Advice Clinic (BLAC) provides free legal advice to Wandsworth borough's residents and workers. Many are referred by local community groups and general advice agencies. The BLAC surgery runs on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday evenings from 7 PM. It is a drop in service which operates on a first come first serve basis. Simmons & Simmons lawyers volunteer as legal advisers and are supported by BPP Law Students.

Generally, student advisers offer initial advice and refer clients where necessary.
